      • grep

        public java.util.Map<java.io.File,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> grep(java.io.File directory,
                                                                         java.lang.String fileSelectionPattern,
                                                                         java.lang.String substringSelectionPattern,
                                                                         boolean recursive)
        Description copied from interface: IGrep
        Find lines that match a given pattern in files whose names match another pattern
        Specified by:
        grep in interface IGrep
        Parameters:
        directory - The base directory to look at files from
        fileSelectionPattern - Pattern for selecting file names
        substringSelectionPattern - Pattern to search for in lines of a file
        recursive - Recursively search through directories
        Returns:
        A Map containing files that had at least one match found inside them. Each file is mapped to a list of strings which are the exact strings from the file where the substringSelectionPattern was found.
